dict.string:
on alfred_script(q) tell application "Notes" tell account "iCloud" tell folder "Interruptions" set date_string to date string of (current date) if not (exists note date_string) then make new note with properties {name:date_string, body:"" & date_string & "
"} end if tell note date_string set body to body & "
â€¢ " & (time string of (current date)) & ": " & q & "" end tell end tell end tell end tell end alfred_script
